elements.name: The contents of the data (id, loan_number, user_id, plan_id, amount,
elements.description:
per_installment, installment_interval, delay_value, charge_per_installment, delay_charge,
  given_installment, total_installment, admin_feedback, status, due_notification_sent,
  approved_at, created_at, updated_at) in the response body should be verified

steps.name: The API user sets "api/loans/approve/17" path parameters
The API user records the response from the api loans approve endpoint with valid authorization information

name: As an administrator, I want to be able to approve the loan information of a user with a given ID through the API connection.
